menuTextTint.description: Colour of the text on the main menu

factRequiredForTitle.description: Ship log fact required for this title screen to appear.

persistentConditionRequiredForTitle.description: Persistent condition required for this title screen to appear.

disableNHPlanets.description: If set to true, NH generated planets will not show on the title screen. If false, this title screen has the same chance as other NH planet title screens to show.

shareTitleScreen.description: If set to true, this custom title screen will merge with all other custom title screens with shareTitleScreen set to true. If false, NH will randomly select between this and other valid title screens that are loaded.

Skybox.description: Customize the skybox for this title screen

music.description: The music audio that will play on the title screen. Can be a path to a .wav/.ogg/.mp3 file, or taken from the AudioClip list.

ambience.description: The ambience audio that will play on the title screen. Can be a path to a .wav/.ogg/.mp3 file, or taken from the AudioClip list.

MenuPlanet.description: Edit properties of the main menu planet

extras.description: Extra data that may be used by extension mods

r.description: The red component of this colour from 0-255, higher values will make the colour glow if applicable.

g.description: The green component of this colour from 0-255, higher values will make the colour glow if applicable.

b.description: The blue component of this colour from 0-255, higher values will make the colour glow if applicable.

a.description: The alpha (opacity) component of this colour

destroyStarField.description: Whether to destroy the star field around the player

useCube.description: Whether to use a cube for the skybox instead of a smooth sphere

rightPath.description: Relative filepath to the texture to use for the skybox's positive X direction

leftPath.description: Relative filepath to the texture to use for the skybox's negative X direction

topPath.description: Relative filepath to the texture to use for the skybox's positive Y direction

bottomPath.description: Relative filepath to the texture to use for the skybox's negative Y direction

frontPath.description: Relative filepath to the texture to use for the skybox's positive Z direction

backPath.description: Relative filepath to the texture to use for the skybox's negative Z direction

rotationSpeed.description: Changes the speed the background rotates (and by extension the main menu planet). This is in degrees per second.

removeChildren.description: Disables the renderers of objects at the provided paths

details.description: A list of DetailInfos to populate the background with.

SimplifiedDetailInfo.description: A lesser form of DetailInfo used for the title screen since that supports fewer features

alignRadial.description:
Do we try to automatically align this object to stand upright relative to the body's center? Stacks with rotation.
Defaults to true for geysers, tornados, and volcanoes, and false for everything else.

isRelativeToParent.description: Whether the positional and rotational coordinates are relative to parent instead of the root planet object.

parentPath.description: The relative path from the planet to the parent of this object. Optional (will default to the root sector).

rename.description: An optional rename of this object

assetBundle.description: Relative filepath to an asset-bundle to load the prefab defined in `path` from

path.description:
Either the path in the scene hierarchy of the item to copy or the path to the object in the supplied asset bundle. 
If empty, will make an empty game object. This can be useful for adding other props to it as its children.

removeChildren.description: A list of children to remove from this detail

removeComponents.description:
Do we reset all the components on this object? Useful for certain props that have dialogue components attached to
them.

stretch.description: Scale each axis of the prop. Overrides `scale`.

destroyMenuPlanet.description: Disables the renderers of the main menu planet and all objects on it (this is to improve compatibility with other mods that don't use the NH title screen json).

removeChildren.description: Disables the renderers of objects at the provided paths

details.description: A list of DetailInfos to populate the main menu planet with.

rotationSpeed.description: Changes the speed the main menu planet. This is in degrees per second.
